name: Ball Arena (creameth)
description:
How To Play: You can change the camera view with A and D buttons and you can go towards with W. Also as a special ability you can stop the ball immediately with using spacebar. But be careful this ability has a 3 seconds cooldown.

This is one of the first games that I have created. I didn't know how to make UI so this game doesn't has a score system or main menu.
